name: Mighty Bandit´s air hockey
description:
Grab yourself a great gaming arcade bargain,
Mighty Bandit´s coconut island Air hockey game, 100% free and 200% fun!

Simply play against the machine or compete with a friend on the same device in the multiplayer mode!
Set the pace, are you a beginner ? well take it slow,
BUT if you are the top notch player you claim to be, then hit it hard with the fast paced speed.
